channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN

item.title: Report X-2024120030
item.description:
Report X-2024120030

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-03T09:15:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-14
  • City: MINNEAPOLIS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT 11;31AM UNLOAD SUPERVISOR CALLED A LEAKER IN DOOR 26 RESPONDER DONNED PPE AND RESPONDED TO THE CALL. RESPONDER ENTERED THE TRAILER AND DISCOVERED A LEAKING 5GAL BUCKET INSIDE WITH TOXIC 6 LABEL, RESPONDER RIKKI FOLLOWED THE DECISON TREE. PROCCEEDS TO PLACE BUCKET INTO SPILL TRAY TO CONTAIN THE SPILLAGE.
